DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi‐center observational study design compare test result Verinata Health Prenatal Aneuploidy Test result conventional prenatal screening fetal chromosome abnormality 'all-risk ' pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old enrollment Clinically confirm pregnancy Gestational age ≥8 week , 0 day Planned complete prenatal serum screening* ( draw 1st and/or 2nd trimester ) Pregnancy record accessible available data collection ( e.g. , result screen , ultrasound examination , invasive prenatal procedure perform , newborn hospital discharge exam ) Able provide consent participation use language appropriate form Invasive prenatal procedure ( amniocentesis CVS ) perform within 2 week prior enrollment Prenatal screening determination Nuchal Translucency ( NT ) measurement
